column2: I'm done now. The Art Institute is such a great museum
column3: and I highly recommend going if you're from out of town or a Chicagoan like me. There's so much to see
column4: there's no way you can see it all in one day
column5: but you can certainly try. I try to make it out about twice a year depending on what exhibits are showing
column6: and it's always a great time.
